mdRecord.dcterms:title: Faculty and Administration at Monticello
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Gross, Stephanie
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Standing in front of Monticello are organizers of the History and New Technologies in the 21st Century conference, held at the nearby Kenwood estate last month. Left to right: William Thomas, director of UVa's Virginia Center for Digital History; Holly Shulman, of UVa.; Jim Horn, from the International Center for Jefferson Studies; and Worthy Martin, UVa associate professor of computer science.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Visual History Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: University of Virginia
University of Virginia. News Office--Press coverage
